QuestData.Title: These Roots Were Made For Stompin'
QuestData.Description: There's so many other spirits still trapped in rotting bodies here...$B$BDo you see? The irontree stompers, in the north. They're sick with demon-stuff and icky with mold. Poor spirits inside them can't get out.$B$BYou can help! Chop them down, and the spirits can get out. I'll put the spirits in me and we can all be happy together when I grow up. Will you help? Please?
QuestData.RewardText: So happy! Can you hear us? We're so many friends now.$B$BBigger and bigger, with room for each friend...
